id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [dallas Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**number**: The pin the sensor bus is connected to. Please note that 1-wire is a bi-directional bus so it requires both input and output from the pin.



*See also: [dallas Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval that the sensors should be checked. Defaults to 60 seconds.



*See also: [dallas Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [dallas Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#id1)*

dallas_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the [dallas hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#dallas-component). Use this if you have multiple dallas hubs.



*See also: [dallas Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#id1)*

address.docs:
**int**: The address of the sensor. Use either this option or index.



*See also: [dallas Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#id1)*

index.docs:
**int**: The index of the sensor starting with 0. So the first sensor will for example have index 0. [It’s recommended to use address instead](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#dallas-getting-ids).



*See also: [dallas Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#id1)*

resolution.docs:
**int**: An optional resolution from 8 to 12. Higher means more accurate. Defaults to the maximum for most Dallas temperature sensors: 12.



*See also: [dallas Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas.html#id1)*
